name: Hello Kitty forum secrets
description: Somebody found and send you the database of a very popular HelloKitty forum. Apparently the forum uses old technology to save passwords, so it should be easy to crack with some password power. Maybe the HelloKitty passwords also work in Amazon to order some HelloKitty merch...

name: Crack'n'Hack
description: %CONTACT% from %COMPANY% called us today. They accidentally deleted their %PW_APPLICATION% passwords and need some cracking power.

name: Security awareness lecture
description: Prof. %CONTACT%, head of %TOWN% %UNIVERSITY% asked you to give a lecture on security awareness.

name: IT security lecture
description: Mister %CONTACT%, CEO at %COMPANY% in %TOWN% wants you to give a lecture on IT security in cooperation with the %TOWN% %UNIVERSITY%.

name: No, this is Patrick
description: The %TOWN% %UNIVERSITY% develops a new mobile communication protocol and needs your help for implementing a new security scheme.

name: Homefront
description: The guy next door, %CONTACT_M%, has a barking dog that really upsets you. Hack his %PW_APPLICATION% as payback.

name: C'mon Honey
description: The %TOWN% library frequently gets hacked by some bad guys. Install a honeypot in their IT system to catch those script kiddies.

name: You, Robot
description: %COMPANY%, a smart home equipment manufacturer has been hijacked. All it's products are now part of a botnet. You need to wipe the malware and find the companies security leak.

name: Memeful intermezzo
description: The monitoring screens at %COMPANY% suddently started to display some dank memes. CEO %CONTACT% turns to you in desperate need of help. Don't forget to save the good memes for your private collection.

name: Dayly bread
description: You are hired for holding a security audit at a %COMPANY% facility in %TOWN%. Hack into their %PW_APPLICATION% to raise security awareness.

name: Catch a ride
description: The %COMPANY% motor company is evaluating the security of their cars electronic key system.

name: You have no power here
description: The %TOWN% power plant organizes a competition for hackers to find security vulnerabilities in their IT system. All piece of cake since they are still running on XP.
